title: Episode 124: How can we reduce the impact of childhood trauma?
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, Ryan and Georjeanna chat with Psych & Stuff all-star Dr. Jason Cowell and Psychology major Karsten Cowan about the negative impacts of adverse childhood experiences on our brains and development and the hope we share to prevent childhood trauma and mitigate the impacts through early intervention.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Ryan and Georjeanna chat with Psâ€¦
description: In this episode, Ryan and Georjeanna chat with Psych & Stuff all-star Dr. Jason Cowell and Psychology major Karsten Cowan about the negative impacts of adverse childhood experiences on our brains and development and the hope we share to prevent childhood trauma and mitigate the impacts through early intervention.
